languages.text: Статуя оббита и изуродована, но даже в таком виде в ней угадывается фигура в мантии — несомненно, один из почитаемых мудрецов и жрецов Адептус Механикус.
The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: Статуя оббита и изуродована, но даже в таком виде в ней угадывается фигура в мантии — несомненно, один из почитаемых мудрецов и жрецов Адептус Механикус.

traits.locale_text: The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: La estatua está desfigurada y mutilada, pero, incluso así, la túnica la hace reconocible como uno de los venerables tecnosacerdotes del Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: La estatua está desfigurada y mutilada, pero, incluso así, la túnica la hace reconocible como uno de los venerables tecnosacerdotes del Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 这座雕像遭到了相当严重的破坏，但即便如此，也可以辨认得出那是个穿着长袍的人，应该是机械修会某位受人敬重的技术神甫。
languages.original_text: The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 这座雕像遭到了相当严重的破坏，但即便如此，也可以辨认得出那是个穿着长袍的人，应该是机械修会某位受人敬重的技术祭司。

languages.text: 像は破壊されて切り刻まれているが、そんな形になっても、ローブをまとう姿からは帝国技術局の尊敬される技術司祭の一人であることがうかがえる。
languages.original_text: The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 像は破壊されて切り刻まれているが、そんな形になっても、ローブをまとう姿からは帝国技術局の尊敬される技術司祭の一人であることがうかがえる。

languages.text: La statue est vandalisée et mutilée, mais même dans cet état, on distingue toujours la silhouette vêtue d'une robe de l'un des vénérables technoprêtres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: La statue est vandalisée et mutilée, mais même dans cet état, on distingue toujours la silhouette vêtue d'une robe de l'un des vénérables technoprêtres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: Die Statue wurde beschädigt und verstümmelt, aber selbst in diesem Zustand ist eine Gestalt mit Robe als ehrwürdiger Techpriester des Adeptus Mechanicus erkennbar.
languages.original_text: The statue is vandalised and mutilated, but even in this form, a figure in a robe is recognisable as one of the revered Tech-Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Die Statue wurde beschädigt und verstümmelt, aber selbst in diesem Zustand ist eine Gestalt mit Robe als ehrwürdiger Techpriester des Adeptus Mechanicus erkennbar.
